amendment.description: Amendment allows the Secretaries to enter into arrangements with tribal governments in order to provide temporary housing for Corps workers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-445 to amend Section 3(f) to allow the Secretaries to enter into arrangement with tribal governments in order to provide temporary housing with Corps volunteers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 402 - 0 (Roll no. 149).
